title: sa_abhinavagupta-paramārthasāra
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<lg>
<l>paraṃ parasthaṃ gahanād anādim ekaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bahudhā guhāsu |</l>
<l>sarvālayaṃ sarvacarācarasthaṃ tvām eva śambhuṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye || 1 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>garbhādhivāsapūrvakamaraṇāntakaduḥkhacakravibhrāntaḥ |</l>
<l>ādhāram bhagavantaṃ śiṣyaḥ papraccha paramārtham || 2 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ādhārakārikābhiḥ taṃ gurur abhibhāṣati sma tatsāram |</l>
<l>kathayaty abhinavaguptaḥ śivaśāsanadṛṣṭiyogena || 3 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>nijaśaktivaibhavabharād a.ṅdacatuṣṭayam idaṃ vibhāgena |</l>
<l>śaktir māyā prakṛtiḥ pṛthvī ceti prabhāvitaṃ prabhuṇā || 4 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tatrāntar viśvam idaṃ vicitratanukaraṇabhuvanasaṃtānam |</l>
<l>bhoktā ca tatra dehī śiva eva gṛhītapaśubhāvaḥ || 5 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>nānāvidhavarṇānāṃ rūpaṃ dhatte yathāmalaḥ sphaṭikaḥ |</l>
<l>suramānuṣapaśupādaparūpatvaṃ tadvad īśo 'pi || 6 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>gacchati gacchati jala iva himakarabimbaṃ sthite sthitiṃ yāti |</l>
<l>tanukaraṇabhuvanavarge tathāyam ātmā maheśānaḥ || 7 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>rāhur adṛśyo 'pi yathā śaśibimbasthaḥ prakāśate tadvat |</l>
<l>sarvagato 'py ayam ātmā viṣayāśrayaṇena dhīmukure || 8 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ādarśe malarahite yadvad vadanaṃ vibhāti tadvad ayam |</l>
<l>śivaśaktipātavimale dhītattve bhāti bhārūpaḥ || 9 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>bhārūpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ svātmani viśrāntito mahānandam |</l>
<l>icchasaṃvitkaraṇair nirbharitam anantaśaktiparipūrṇam || 10 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sarvavikalpavihīnaṃ śuddhaṃ śāntaṃ layodayavihīnam |</l>
<l>yat paratattvaṃ tasmin vibhāti ṣaṭṭriṃśadātma jagat || 11 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>darpaṇabimbe yadvan nagaragrāmādicitram avibhāgi |</l>
<l>bhāti vibhāgenaiva ca parasparaṃ darpaṇād api ca || 12 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>vimalatamaparamabhairavabodhāt tadvad vibhāgaśūnyam api |</l>
<l>anyonyaṃ ca tato 'pi ca vibhaktam ābhāti jagad etat || 13 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>śivaśaktisadāśivatām īśvaravidyāmayīṃ ca tattvadaśām |</l>
<l>śaktīnāṃ pañcānāṃ vibhaktabhāvena bhāsayati || 14 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>paramaṃ yat svātantryaṃ durghaṭasaṃpādanaṃ maheśasya |</l>
<l>devī māyāśaktiḥ svātmāvaraṇaṃ śivasya itat || 15 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>māyāparigrahavaśād bodho malinaḥ pumān paśur bhavati |</l>
<l>kālakalāniyatibalād rāgāvidyāvaśena saṃbaddhaḥ || 16 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>adhunaiva kiṃcid evedam eva sarvātmanaiva jānāmi |</l>
<l>māyāsahitaṃ kañcukaṣaṭkam aṇor antaraṅgam idam uktam || 17 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>kambukam iva ta.ṅdulakaṇaviniviṣṭaṃ bhinnam apy abhidā |</l>
<l>bhajate tat tu viśuddhiṃ śivamārgaunmukhyayogena || 18 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sukhaduḥkhamohamātraṃ niścayasaṃkalpanābhimānāc ca |</l>
<l>prakṛtir athāntaḥkaranaṃ buddhimano'haṃkṛtikramaśaḥ || 19 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>śrotraṃ tvagakṣirasanā ghrāṇaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi śabdādau |</l>
<l>vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthaṃ karmendriyāṇi punaḥ || 20 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>eṣāṃ grāhyo viṣayaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravibhāgavarjito yaḥ syāt |</l>
<l>tanmātrapañcakaṃ tat śabdaḥ sparśo maho raso gandhaḥ || 21 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>etatsaṃsargavaśāt sthūlo viṣayas tu bhūtapañcakatām |</l>
<l>abhyeti nabhaḥ pavanas tejaḥ salilaṃ ca pṛthvī ca || 22 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tuṣa iva ta.ṅdulakaṇikām āvṛṇute prakṛtipūrvakaḥ sargaḥ |</l>
<l>pṛthvīparyanto 'yaṃ caitanyaṃ dehabhāvena || 23 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>param āvaraṇaṃ mala iha sūkṣmaṃ māyādikañcukaṃ sthūlam |</l>
<l>bāhyaṃ vigraharūpaṃ kośatrayaveṣṭito hy ātmā || 24 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ajñānatimirayogād ekam api svaṃ svabhāvam ātmānam |</l>
<l>grāhyagrāhakanānāvaicitryeṇāvabudhyeta || 25 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>rasaphāṇitaśarkarikāguḍakha.ṅdādyā yathekṣurasa eva |</l>
<l>tadvad avasthā bhedāḥ sarve paramātmanaḥ śambhoḥ || 26 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>vijñānāntaryāmiprāṇavirāḍdehajātipi.ṅdāntāḥ |</l>
<l>vyavahāramātram etat paramārthena tu na santy eva || 27 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>rajjvāṃ nāsti bhujaṅgas trāsaṃ kurute ca mṛtyuparyantam |</l>
<l>bhrānter mahatī śaktir na vivektuṃ śakyate nāma || 28 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tadvad dharmādharmasvarnirayotpattimaraṇasukhaduḥkham |</l>
<l>varṇāśramādi cātmany asad api vibhramabalād bhavati || 29 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>etat tad andhakāraṃ yad bhāveṣu prakāśamānatayā |</l>
<l>ātmānatirikteṣv api bhavaty anātmābhimāno 'yam || 30 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>timirād api timiram idaṃ ga.ṅdasyopari mahān ayaṃ sphoṭaḥ |</l>
<l>yad anātmany api dehaprāṇadāv ātmamānitvam || 31 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>dehaprāṇavimarśanadhījñānanabhaḥprapañcayogena |</l>
<l>ātmānam veṣṭayate citraṃ jālena jālakāra iva || 32 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>svajñānavibhavabhāsanayogenodveṣṭayen nijātmānam |</l>
<l>iti bandhamokṣacitrāṃ krīḍāṃ pratanoti paramaśivaḥ || 33 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārā jāgratsvapnau suṣuptam iti tasmin |</l>
<l>bhānti turīye dhāmani tathāpi tair nāvṛtaṃ bhāti || 34 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>jāgrad viśvaṃ bhedāt svapnas tejaḥ prakāśamāhātmyāt |</l>
<l>prājñaḥ suptāvasthā jñānaghanatvāt tataḥ paraṃ turyam || 35 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>jaladharadhūmarajobhir malinīkriyate yathā na gaganatalam |</l>
<l>tadvan māyāvikṛtibhir aparāmṛṣṭaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ || 36 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ekasmin ghaṭagagane rajasā vyāpte bhavanti nānyāni |</l>
<l>malināni tadvad ete jīvāḥ sukhaduḥkhabhedajuṣaḥ || 37 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>śānte śānta ivāyaṃ hṛṣṭe hṛṣṭo vimohavati mūḍhaḥ |</l>
<l>tattvagaṇe sati bhagavān na punaḥ paramārthataḥ sa tathā || 38 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>yad anātmany api tadrūpāvabhāsanaṃ tat purā nirākṛtya |</l>
<l>ātmany anātmarūpāṃ bhrāntiṃ vidalayati paramātmā || 39 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>itthaṃ vibhramayugalakasamūlavicchedane kṛtārthasya |</l>
<l>kartavyāntarakalanā na jātu parayogino bhavati || 40 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>pṛthivī prakṛtir māyā tritayam idaṃ vedyarūpatāpatitam |</l>
<l>advaitabhāvanabalād bhavati hi sanmātrapariśeṣam || 41 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>raśanāku.ṅdalakaṭakaṃ bhedatyāgena dṛśyate yathā hema |</l>
<l>tadvad bhedatyāge sanmātraṃ sarvam ābhāti || 42 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tad brahma paraṃ śuddhaṃ śāntaṃ abhedātmakaṃ samaṃ sakalam |</l>
<l>amṛtaṃ satyaṃ śaktau viśrāmyati bhāsvarūpāyām || 43 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>iṣyata iti vedyata iti saṃpādyata iti ca bhāsvarūpeṇa |</l>
<l>aparāmṛṣṭaṃ yad api tu nabhaḥprasūnatvam abhyeti || 44 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>śaktitriśūlaparigamayogena samastam api parameśe |</l>
<l>śivanāmani paramārthe visṛjyate devadevena || 45 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>punar api ca pañcaśaktiprasaraṇakrameṇa bahir api tat |</l>
<l>a.ṅdatrayaṃ vicitraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ bahirātmalābhena || 46 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>iti śakticakrayantraṃ krīḍāyogena vāhayan devaḥ |</l>
<l>aham eva śuddharūpaḥ śaktimahācakranāyakapadasthaḥ || 47 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>mayy eva bhāti viśvaṃ darpaṇa iva nirmale ghatādīni |</l>
<l>mattaḥ prasarati sarvaṃ svapnavicitratvam iva suptāt || 48 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>aham eva viśvarūpaḥ karacaranādisvabhāva iva dehaḥ |</l>
<l>sarvasmin aham eva sphurāmi bhāveṣu bhāsvarūpam iva || 49 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā dehendriyavarjito 'py akartāpi |</l>
<l>siddhāntāgamatarkāṃś citrān aham eva racayāmi || 50 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>itthaṃ dvaitavikalpe galite pravilaṅghya mohinīṃ māyām |</l>
<l>salile salilaṃ kṣīre kṣīram iva brahmaṇi layī syāt || 51 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>itthaṃ tattvasamūhe bhāvanayā śivamayatvam abhiyāte |</l>
<l>kaḥ śokaḥ ko mohaḥ sarvaṃ brahmāvalokayataḥ || 52 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>karmaphalaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ mithyājñānena saṃgamād eva |</l>
<l>viṣamo hi saṅgadoṣas taskarayogo 'py ataskarasyeva || 53 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>lokavyavahārakṛtāṃ ya ihāvidyām upāsate mūḍhāḥ |</l>
<l>te yānti janmamṛtyū dharmādharmārgalābaddhāḥ || 54 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ajñānakālanicitaṃ dharmādharmātmakaṃ tu karmāpi |</l>
<l>cirasaṃcitam iva tūlaṃ naśyati vijñānadīptivaśāt || 55 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>jñānaprāptau kṛtam api na phalāya tato 'sya janma katham |</l>
<l>gatajanmabandhayogo bhāti śivārkaḥ svadīdhitibhiḥ || 56 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tuṣakambukakiṃśārukamuktaṃ bījaṃ yathāṅkuraṃ kurute |</l>
<l>naiva tathāṇavamāyākarmavimukto bhavāṅkuraṃ hy ātmā || 57 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ātmajño na kutaścana bibheti sarvaṃ hi tasya nijarūpam |</l>
<l>naiva ca śocati yasmāt paramārthe nāśitā nāsti || 58 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>atigūḍhahṛdayagañjaprarūḍhaparamārtharatnasaṃcayataḥ |</l>
<l>aham eveti maheśvarabhāve kā durgatiḥ kasya || 59 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>mokṣasya naiva kiṃcid dhāmāsti na cāpi gamanam anyatra |</l>
<l>ajñānagranthibhidā svaśaktyabhivyaktatā mokṣaḥ || 60 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>bhinnājñānagranthir gatasaṃdehaḥ parākṛtabhrāntiḥ |</l>
<l>prakṣīṇapuṇyapāpo vigrahayoge 'py asau muktaḥ || 61 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>agnyabhidagdhaṃ bījaṃ yathā prarohāsamarthatām eti |</l>
<l>jñānāgnidagdham evaṃ karma na janmapradaṃ bhavati || 62 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>parimitabuddhitvena hi karmocitabhāvidehabhāvanayā |</l>
<l>saṅkucitā citir etaddehadhvaṃse tathā bhāti || 63 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>yadi punar amalaṃ bodhaṃ sarvasamuttīrnaboddhṛkartṛmayam |</l>
<l>vitatam anastamitoditabhārūpam satyasaṃkalpam || 64 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>dikkālakalanavikalaṃ dhruvam avyayam īśvaraṃ suparipūrṇam |</l>
<l>bahutaraśaktivrātapralayodayaviracanaikakartāram || 65 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sṛṣṭyādividhisuvedhasam ātmānaṃ śivamayaṃ vibudhyeta |</l>
<l>katham iva saṃsārī syād vitatasya kutaḥ kva vā saraṇam || 66 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>iti yuktibhir api siddhaṃ yatkarma jñānino na saphalaṃ tat |</l>
<l>na mamedam api tu tasyeti dārḍhyato na hi phalaṃ loke || 67 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>itthaṃ sakalavikalpān pratibuddho bhāvanāsamīraṇataḥ |</l>
<l>ātmajyotiṣi dīpte juhvaj jyotirmayo bhavati || 68 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>aśnan yad vā tad vā saṃvīto yena kenacic chāntaḥ |</l>
<l>yatra kvacana nivāsī vimucyate sarvabhūtātmā || 69 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>hayamedhaśatasahasrāṇy api kurute brahmaghātalakṣāṇi |</l>
<l>paramārthavin na puṇyair na ca pāpaiḥ spṛśyate vimalaḥ || 70 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>madaharṣakopamanmathaviṣādabhayalobhamohaparivarjī |</l>
<l>niḥstotravaṣaṭkāro jaḍa iva vicared avādamatiḥ || 71 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>madaharṣaprabhṛtir ayaṃ vargaḥ prabhavati vibhedasaṃmohāt |</l>
<l>advaitātmavibodhas tena kathaṃ spṛśyatāṃ nāma || 72 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>stutyaṃ vā hotavyaṃ nāsti vyatiriktam asya kiṃcana ca |</l>
<l>stotrādinā sa tuṣyen muktas tan nirnamaskṛtivaṣaṭkaḥ || 73 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ṣaṭtriṃśattattvabhṛtaṃ vigraharacanāgavākṣaparipūrṇam |</l>
<l>nijam anyad atha śarīraṃ ghaṭādi vā tasya devagṛham || 74 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tatra ca paramātmamahābhairavaśivadevatāṃ svaśaktiyutām |</l>
<l>ātmāmarśanavimaladravyaiḥ paripūjayann āste || 75 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>bahirantaraparikalpanabhedamahābījanicayam arpayataḥ |</l>
<l>tasyātidīptasaṃvijjvalane yatnād vinā bhavati homaḥ || 76 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>dhyānam anastamitaṃ punar eṣa hi bhagavān vicitrarūpāṇi |</l>
<l>sṛjati tad eva dhyānaṃ saṃkalpālikhitasatyarūpatvam || 77 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>bhuvanāvalīṃ samastāṃ tattvakramakalpanām athākṣagaṇam |</l>
<l>antarbodhe parivartayati ca yat so 'sya japa uditaḥ || 78 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sarvaṃ samayā dṛṣṭyā yat paśyati yac ca saṃvidaṃ manute |</l>
<l>viśvaśmaśānaniratāṃ vigrahakhaṭvāṅgakalpanākalitām || 79 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>viśvarasāsavapūrṇaṃ nijakaragaṃ vedyakha.ṅdakakapālam |</l>
<l>rasayati ca yat tad etad vratam asya sudurlabhaṃ ca sulabhaṃ ca || 80 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>iti janmanāśahīnaṃ paramārthamaheśvarākhyam upalabhya |</l>
<l>upalabdhṛtāprakāśāt kṛtakṛtyas tiṣṭhati yatheṣṭam || 81 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>vyāpinam abhihitam itthaṃ sarvātmānaṃ vidhūtanānātvam |</l>
<l>nirupamaparamānandaṃ yo vetti sa tanmayo bhavati || 82 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tīrthe śvapacagṛhe vā naṣṭasmṛtir api parityajan deham |</l>
<l>jñānasamakālamuktaḥ kaivalyaṃ yāti hataśokaḥ || 83 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>puṇyāya tīrthasevā nirayāya śvapacasadananidhanagatiḥ |</l>
<l>puṇyāpuṇyakalaṅkasparśābhāve tu kiṃ tena || 84 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tuṣakambukasupṛthakkṛtata.ṅdulakaṇatuṣadalāntarakṣepaḥ |</l>
<l>ta.ṅdulakaṇasya kurute na punas tadrūpatādātmyam || 85 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tadvat kañcukapaṭalīpṛthakkṛtā saṃvid atra saṃskārāt |</l>
<l>tiṣṭhanty api muktātmā tatsparśavivarjitā bhavati || 86 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>kuśalatamaśilpikalpitavimalībhāvaḥ samudgakopādheḥ |</l>
<l>malino 'pi maṇir upādher vicchede svacchaparamārthaḥ || 87 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>evaṃ sadguruśāsanavimalasthiti vedanaṃ tanūpādheḥ |</l>
<l>muktam apy upādhyantaraśūnyam ivābhāti śivarūpam || 88 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>śāstrādiprāmāṇyād avicalitaśraddhayāpi tanmayatām |</l>
<l>prāptaḥ sa eva pūrvaṃ svargaṃ narakaṃ manuṣyatvam || 89 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>antyaḥ kṣaṇas tu tasmin puṇyāṃ pāpāṃ ca vā sthitiṃ puṣyan |</l>
<l>mūḍhānāṃ sahakārībhāvaṃ gacchati gatau tu na sa hetuḥ || 90 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>ye 'pi tadātmatvena viduḥ paśupakṣisarīsṛpādayaḥ svagatim |</l>
<l>te 'pi purātanasaṃbodhasaṃskṛtās tāṃ gatiṃ yānti || 91 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>svargamayo nirayamayas tad ayaṃ dehāntarālagaḥ puruṣaḥ |</l>
<l>tadbhaṅge svaucityād dehāntarayogam abhyeti || 92 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>evaṃ jñānāvasare svātmā sakṛd asya yādṛg avabhātaḥ |</l>
<l>tādṛśa eva tadāsau na dehapāte 'nyathā bhavati || 93 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>karaṇagaṇasaṃpramoṣaḥ smṛtināśaḥ śvāsakalilatā cchedaḥ |</l>
<l>marmasu rujāviśeṣāḥ śarīrasaṃskārajo bhogaḥ || 94 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sa kathaṃ vigrahayoge sati na bhavet tena mohayoge 'pi |</l>
<l>maraṇāvasare jñāni na cyavate svātmaparamārthāt || 95 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>paramārthamārgam enaṃ jhaṭiti yadā gurumukhāt samabhyeti |</l>
<l>atitīvraśaktipātāt tadaiva nirvighnam eva śivaḥ || 96 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>sarvottīrṇaṃ rūpaṃ sopānapadakrameṇa saṃśrayataḥ |</l>
<l>paratattvarūḍhilābhe paryante śivamayībhāvaḥ || 97 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tasya tu paramārthamayīṃ dhārām agatasya madhyaviśrānteḥ |</l>
<l>tatpadalābhotsukacetaso 'pi maraṇaṃ kadācit syāt || 98 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>yogabhraṣṭaḥ śāstre kathito 'sau citrabhogabhuvanapatiḥ |</l>
<l>viśrāntisthānavaśād bhūtvā janmāntare śivībhavati || 99 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>paramārthamārgam enaṃ hy abhyasyāprāpya yogam api nāma |</l>
<l>suralokabhogabhāgī muditamanā modate suciram || 100 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>viṣayeṣu sārvabhaumaḥ sarvajanaiḥ pūjyate yathā rājā |</l>
<l>bhuvaneṣu sarvadaivair yogabhraṣṭas tathā pūjyaḥ || 101 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>mahatā kālena punar mānuṣyaṃ prāpya yogam abhyasya |</l>
<l>prāpnoti divyam amṛtam yasmād āvartate na punaḥ || 102 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>tasmāt sanmārge 'smin nirato yaḥ kaścid eti sa śivatvam |</l>
<l>iti matvā paramārthe yathā tathāpi prayatanīyam || 103 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>idam abhinavaguptoditasaṃkṣepaṃ dhyāyataḥ paraṃ brahma |</l>
<l>acirād eva śivatvaṃ nijahṛdayāveśam abhyeti || 104 ||</l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l>āryāśatena tad idaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ śāstrasāram atigūḍham |</l>
<l>abhinavaguptena mayā śivacaraṇasmaraṇadīptena || 105 ||</l>
</lg>
